short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhanced Google Flights for savvy travelers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SkySavvy is a Chrome extension that enhances Google Flights with style changes and additional data in flight search results for savvy travelers.

Key Features:

üíª Page Style Enhancements:
‚Ä¢ Widens the page to reduce clutter and take advantage of wider screens
‚Ä¢ Hides the footer that contained unnecessary links
‚Ä¢ Hides various annoying disclaimers that cluttered the interface (e.g., "Displayed currencies may differ", "Prices include fees", etc.)
‚Ä¢ Hides the "Price Guarantee" advertisement banner
‚Ä¢ Hides CO2 emissions data from the top-level of each search result (the same information is still available in the expanded view)
‚Ä¢ Supports both light and dark mode
‚Ä¢ Lightweight; ad-free and tracker-free

üå¥ Holiday Highlighting:
‚Ä¢ Highlights holidays (US only for now) in the date-pickers, helping you easily visualize travel dates that may be more expensive.

‚úàÔ∏è Additional Flight Data:
‚Ä¢ Adds seat and leg room information to each search result
‚Ä¢ Adds a FlightAware link for each flight segment
‚Ä¢ Adds detailed aircraft IATA code and Wikipedia link
‚Ä¢ Adds SeatGuru link for the specific aircraft type
‚Ä¢ Adds LoungeBuddy links for lounges in the origin and destination airports
‚Ä¢ Adds airline miles award program data
‚Ä¢ Adds airline transfer partner data (and point transfer ratios)
‚Ä¢ Adds visual call outs for Delta One, Delta One Suites, and Qsuites in business class
‚Ä¢ Adds airline award program details and links
‚Ä¢ Adds partner transfer data for all popular US/EU airlines for Amex, Chase, CapitalOne, Bilt, and Marriott Bonvoy programs

üé• Flight Media:
‚Ä¢ Adds relevant media of aircraft, cabins, seats, etc.

üí† Other Enhancements:
‚Ä¢ "Lie Flat" seat filter to quickly surface lie flat and suite business class flights
‚Ä¢ "Suite" seat filter to quickly surface suites for business and first class flights
‚Ä¢ "Aircraft" filter to quickly filter flights by aircraft (Boeing, Airbus, etc.)

üîé SkySavvy "TravelBar":
‚Ä¢ Search flights, airports, airlines, and planes directly from the Chrome search bar using the "ss" keyword

----------------------------------------------
More Details:
https://github.com/matthewdfuller/skysavvy-docs

Privacy & Security:
https://github.com/matthewdfuller/skysavvy-docs#security-and-privacy

Keywords: Google Flights, flights, aviation, travel search, planes, aircraft, flight search, travel engine, booking engine

Changelog:
1.6.0
‚Ä¢ Adds filters for aircraft types
‚Ä¢ Hides the "Price Guarantee" advertisement banner

1.5.0
‚Ä¢ Adding the SkySavvy "TravelBar" - search flights, airports, airlines, and planes directly from the Chrome search bar using the "ss" keyword

1.4.0
‚Ä¢ Adds dynamic ANA (All Nippon Airways) award point data to flight results (supports zones, seasons, and cabin class combinations)

1.3.0
‚Ä¢ Added award program data and links for all top US/EU airlines to search results
‚Ä¢ Added credit card transfer data (Amex, Chase, CapitalOne, Bilt, and Marriott Bonvoy programs) to search results

1.2.0
‚Ä¢ Added a "Suites" filter to search for suite-only flights
‚Ä¢ Performance improvements for the addition of seat data to search results

1.1.0
‚Ä¢ Removed API lookups; all flight data is now loaded locally
‚Ä¢ Added seat and legroom information to each search result
‚Ä¢ Fixing some bugs causing added flight information to disappear (this still happens in some cases)

1.0.0
‚Ä¢ Initial release
